name: dos
content:
dos and don'ts
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also do's and don'ts) rules about actions and activities that people should or should not perform or take part in: The teacher spent ten minutes explaining all the dos and don'ts in the classroom.
See more
abbreviation for denial of service: an occasion when a computer network or website is intentionally prevented from working correctly, by a person or group sending a large amount of data at one time: DoS attacks can be motivated by revenge, blackmail, or activism. One type of DoS involves redirecting outgoing messages from the client back to the client.
